SVDMonitorConvergedDrawLGCreate

Creates the plotter for the convergence history.

Synopsis

#include "slepcsvd.h" 
PetscErrorCode SVDMonitorConvergedDrawLGCreate(PetscViewer viewer,PetscViewerFormat format,void *ctx,PetscViewerAndFormat **vf)
Collective on viewer

Input Parameters

viewer  - the viewer
format  - the viewer format
ctx  - an optional user context

Output Parameter

vf  - the viewer and format context

See Also

SVDMonitorSet()

Level

intermediate

Location

src/svd/interface/svdmon.c
